column4: Description
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Verify Google Workspace tenant is properly configured
column6: 1. Login to Admin Console; 2. Verify domain status; 3. Check subscription; 4. Validate organization settings
column7: Tenant accessible with Business Plus edition active for 500 users

column4: Verify OU structure matches design with 5 departments
column6: 1. Navigate to Directory; 2. Expand OU tree; 3. Verify 5 department OUs; 4. Check user assignments
column7: 5 OUs visible (Sales Marketing Operations Finance Executive)

column4: Verify Azure AD SSO integration works correctly
column6: 1. Navigate to Google login; 2. Enter corporate email; 3. Verify redirect to Azure AD; 4. Complete authentication
column7: Users authenticate via Azure AD SSO without password prompt

column4: Verify GCDS syncs users from Active Directory
column6: 1. Check GCDS sync status; 2. Verify users in Admin Console; 3. Confirm group sync; 4. Validate attributes
column7: Users and groups synced within 4-hour interval

column4: Verify 2SV is enforced for all users
column6: 1. Attempt login without 2SV; 2. Verify enrollment prompt; 3. Complete 2SV setup; 4. Test subsequent login
column7: Users required to enroll in 2SV before accessing Workspace

column4: Verify Gmail is accessible and functional for users
column6: 1. Login to Gmail; 2. Send test email; 3. Receive test email; 4. Verify labels and filters
column7: Gmail fully functional with send receive and organization features

column4: Verify Drive storage and sharing works correctly
column6: 1. Login to Drive; 2. Upload test file; 3. Create shared folder; 4. Test sharing permissions
column7: Drive accessible with 5 TB storage and sharing working

column4: Verify Shared Drives created for team collaboration
column6: 1. Navigate to Shared Drives; 2. Verify 15 Shared Drives; 3. Test file upload; 4. Check member access
column7: 15 Shared Drives operational with correct permissions

column4: Verify Meet video conferencing works correctly
column6: 1. Create test meeting; 2. Join meeting; 3. Test video and audio; 4. Test screen sharing; 5. Test recording
column7: Meet functional with video audio sharing and recording

column4: Verify DLP policies detect and block sensitive data
column6: 1. Create document with PII; 2. Attempt to share externally; 3. Verify DLP warning; 4. Test block action
column7: DLP detects sensitive data and blocks or warns per policy

column4: Verify Vault retains data per 7-year policy
column6: 1. Access Vault admin; 2. Verify retention rules; 3. Search retained emails; 4. Create legal hold
column7: Vault retaining Gmail and Drive data per 7-year policy

column4: Verify MDM policies apply to enrolled devices
column6: 1. Enroll test device; 2. Verify passcode requirement; 3. Test app installation; 4. Verify remote wipe capability
column7: Devices managed with passcode and wipe capabilities

column4: Verify pilot mailbox migration completes successfully
column6: 1. Select 25 pilot mailboxes; 2. Start migration; 3. Monitor progress; 4. Validate data integrity
column7: 25 pilot mailboxes migrated with all emails folders and labels

column4: Verify file server data migrates to Drive correctly
column6: 1. Map source folders; 2. Start file migration; 3. Monitor transfer; 4. Validate permissions
column7: Files migrated with folder structure and permissions preserved

column4: Verify distribution lists convert to Google Groups
column6: 1. Import distribution list; 2. Verify membership; 3. Test email delivery; 4. Check external senders
column7: 150 distribution lists converted to Groups with membership intact

column4: Verify calendar data migrates correctly
column6: 1. Migrate pilot calendars; 2. Verify appointments; 3. Check recurring events; 4. Validate sharing
column7: Calendars migrated with all appointments and sharing settings

column4: Verify Sales department migration successful
column6: 1. Migrate 95 Sales mailboxes; 2. Migrate Sales files; 3. Validate data; 4. User acceptance
column7: Sales department (95 users) fully migrated and operational

column4: Verify remaining departments migrate successfully
column6: 1. Execute Waves 2-5 per schedule; 2. Validate each wave; 3. Monitor issues; 4. User sign-off
column7: All 500 users migrated with zero data loss

column4: Description
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Verify email delivery meets performance targets
column6: 1. Send bulk test emails; 2. Measure delivery time; 3. Test attachment handling; 4. Verify queuing
column7: Emails delivered within 30 seconds for internal and 2 minutes external

column4: Verify Drive File Stream sync performance
column6: 1. Install Drive File Stream; 2. Sync large folder; 3. Measure sync time; 4. Test offline access
column7: Files sync within 5 minutes for 1 GB folder

column4: Verify Meet video quality under load
column6: 1. Create 50-participant meeting; 2. Test video quality; 3. Test screen sharing; 4. Measure latency
column7: Video quality maintained at 720p with latency under 200ms

column4: Verify migration completes within timeline
column6: 1. Measure mailbox migration rate; 2. Measure file transfer rate; 3. Calculate total duration
column7: Migration rate of 10 GB per hour sustained

column4: Verify SSO security controls are effective
column6: 1. Test invalid credentials; 2. Test session timeout; 3. Test logout; 4. Verify audit logs
column7: Invalid logins blocked and all auth events logged

column4: Verify DLP catches sensitive data patterns
column6: 1. Test SSN patterns; 2. Test credit card patterns; 3. Test custom patterns; 4. Verify actions
column7: DLP detects 95%+ of sensitive data patterns

column4: Verify MDM security policies are enforced
column6: 1. Test without passcode; 2. Test compromised device; 3. Test remote wipe; 4. Verify encryption
column7: Non-compliant devices blocked and wipe functional

column4: Verify Google Workspace meets 99.9% SLA
column6: 1. Monitor service status; 2. Track any outages; 3. Calculate uptime; 4. Compare to SLA
column7: Workspace services maintain 99.9%+ uptime

column4: Verify Vault meets 7-year retention requirement
column6: 1. Verify retention policy; 2. Test search across 7 years; 3. Test legal hold; 4. Verify export
column7: Data retained and searchable for 7-year period

column4: Verify audit logs capture all required events
column6: 1. Review admin logs; 2. Review user logs; 3. Verify completeness; 4. Test log export
column7: All admin and user activities logged and exportable

column4: Description
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Verify pilot users can send and receive email
column6: 1. Pilot user logs in; 2. Access Gmail; 3. Send test email; 4. Receive reply
column7: Pilot users can send and receive email without issues

column4: Verify pilot users can access migrated files
column6: 1. Pilot user logs in; 2. Access Drive; 3. Open migrated files; 4. Edit and save
column7: Pilot users can access and edit all migrated files

column4: Verify pilot users can collaborate in real-time
column6: 1. Create shared document; 2. Invite collaborators; 3. Edit simultaneously; 4. Track changes
column7: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously

column4: Verify users can access Workspace from mobile devices
column6: 1. Install Gmail app; 2. Install Drive app; 3. Access email; 4. Access files
column7: Users can access email and files from managed mobile devices

column4: Verify users can perform key tasks after training
column6: 1. Send email with attachment; 2. Share Drive file; 3. Schedule Meet; 4. Create Docs
column7: Users can perform all trained tasks independently

column4: Verify each department approves migration quality
column6: 1. Department review; 2. Data validation; 3. Functionality test; 4. Sign-off
column7: Each department lead signs off on migration quality

column4: Verify IT team can manage Workspace effectively
column6: 1. Create user; 2. Reset password; 3. Manage groups; 4. Run reports
column7: IT admins can perform all required admin tasks

column4: Verify helpdesk can support Workspace users
column6: 1. Handle password reset; 2. Troubleshoot login; 3. Resolve Drive issue; 4. Escalate appropriately
column7: Helpdesk can resolve common issues per runbook
